<a id="CompressedTextureLayered"></a>

# CompressedTextureLayered

**Inherits:** [TextureLayered](TextureLayered.md) **\<** [Texture](Texture.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

**Inherited By:** [CompressedCubemap](CompressedCubemap.md), [CompressedCubemapArray](CompressedCubemapArray.md), [CompressedTexture2DArray](CompressedTexture2DArray.md)

Base class for texture arrays that can optionally be compressed.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Base class for [CompressedTexture2DArray](CompressedTexture2DArray.md) and [CompressedTexture3D](CompressedTexture3D.md). Cannot be used directly, but contains all the functions necessary for accessing the derived resource types. See also [TextureLayered](TextureLayered.md).
